events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it because it doesn't meet my expectations. How can I get a refund?
The reported issue was categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning return and refund.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refund processes.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your order and request a refund. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund efficiently?
The order number is 123456789. I just don’t like the color and it looks different from the pictures on your website.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a return for you. Once we receive the product back, a full refund will be processed to your original payment method.
That sounds good to me. Please let me know how to send the item back and how long the refund process will take.
You will receive a prepaid return shipping label by email shortly. Please send the item within 7 days. Refunds usually take 5-7 business days after we receive the item.
Your refund request has been successfully initiated. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your return shipping label and if the refund was processed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I got the label and sent the package yesterday. Also, the refund was processed today. Thanks for your help!
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now, and we appreciate your understanding.
